p: The leaves are opposite and imparipennates, stipellae. The inflorescence is paniculate with different colour flowers; the calyx is campanulate, adherent stamen, vexillary filament, ovate and dorsifixed anther, pubescent and sessile ovary. The seeds are kidney-shaped having funicle. The pod is flat, coriaceous and woody ( Banzouzi et al., 2008).
